Feral/Verdant:



After months of drifting, the ship had arrived.  But parts of it were plant, 
not Cybertronian machinery.

Feral stood, feeling groggy, but quickly felt energized, as if he had 
adrenaline.  But he was a robot.  His optics came online, and he let out a 
scream and turned, and let out another scream, that became a laugh.

Verdant rose to all four legs, wondering what was going on.  Wait, he didn't 
have four legs!  He let out a yell, but it turned into a roar.  -What the 
Pit's going on?- he asked himself, looking around and seeing a mix of plant, 
animal, and machinery that was Feral.

You're a monster! he tried to say, but it came out as grunts.

"I...I can understand you!  Verdant, is that you?"
